content: this is a quick pattern i made to complete a set using the brownie hat 1 and rowan s wristies 2 my projects for these can be seen here 3 and here 4 grats to both those designers on some nice patterns the pattern has not yet been tested so please let me know if there are improvements that you think should be made or if you encounter any problems 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/brownie-2 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rowans-wristies 3 http //www ravelry com/projects/fpwear/brownie 4 http //www ravelry com/projects/fpwear/rowans-wristies
